8.textMFS: <VL<T'Can you get the blue point to the green circle?'>>

186.textMFS: <VL<T'Don’t let it touch the pools of hot lava!'>>

209.textMFS: <VL<T'State machine: '><T'0. Not yet started, button off. Shows \"can / don\'t\" message. Transition to 1 on button press. (Press erases traces)'><T'1. Working, dragging, P\' in empty space: shows \"can / don\'t\" message. Transition to finished: 2 on lava hit or 3 on circle hit.'><T'2. Finished: P\' hits hot lava: P & P\' replaced by fakes: shows Oops message; button is off. Transition to 1 on button press.'><T'3. Finished: P\' hits circle: P & P\' replaced by fakes: shows Congrats message; button is off. Transition to 1 on button press.'><0><T'Because the user drag may continue after hitting lava or circle, the messages in states 2 and 3 must be based on the location'><T'of the fake P\', which is instantly moved to the location of the real P\', but cannot be dragged further.'><F110xxFFFFFFFFx20x02x>>

214.textMFS: <VL<T'Oops! You fell in the hot lava!'>>
